With 3.1.0 things aren't going well, with this error stopping things:

SEVE=
RE Invalid property 'textSource.value' of bean class [org.archive.modules.s=
eeds.TextSeedModule]: Bean property 'value' is not writable or has an inval=
id setter method. Does the parameter type of the setter match the return ty=
pe of the getter?; Can't create bean 'seeds'

My job file is set up this wa=
y, with the file seeds.txt located in the jobs folder where the .cxml job i=
s found:

<bean id=3D"seeds" class=3D"org.archive.modules.seeds.TextSeedMod=
ule">
<property name=3D"textSource">
<bean class=3D"org.archive.spring.Conf=
igFile">
<property name=3D"path" value=3D"seeds.txt"/>
</bean>
</property>
=
<property name=3D"sourceTagSeeds" value=3D"false"/>
<property name=3D"block=
AwaitingSeedLines" value=3D"-1"/>
</bean>

The seeds.txt file itself is sim=
ply a few URLs, one per line.
I've been unable to determine what other form=
at might be expected.

I'm a beginner and Heritrix is far too advanced for =
my skills, but I've managed to get this far and would like to get through t=
his little bump and get this thing running. Surely someone has seen this er=
ror.
